title: Seaweed
summaries: Seaweed is a pet-summoning item which summons a Turtle pet that follows the player, like other pets. Seaweed can rarely be found in the Underground Jungle's Jungle Shrines or Living Mahogany Trees. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, it can also be found in Jungle Crates and Bramble Crates.

statistics.Sell: 2
